valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 12 Nov 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 13 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Lows Cromarty 987 and Malin 982 both losing their identities

Viking.text:
Wind
Cyclonic 5 to 7 becoming northerly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 in north.
Sea state
Moderate or rough becoming rough or very rough, occasionally high for a time in north.
Weather
Rain then squally showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
